name: Wire~game
description:
A game where you can create any kind of logic circuit and share it with others.

You have 5 types of tiles you can draw:

  • Wire - Transfers energy to other tiles.
  • Lever - Switch it to turn on the tiles around it.
  • Repeater - sends signal to NOT tile (inverter tile).
  • NOT - Inverts the signal from the repeater.
  • Translator - Transfers the signal to another layer it there is a translator.

Gamemodes:

  • Draw - You can draw tiles in draw mode.
  • Play - You can switch levers and test your creations.

Controls:

Left clickPlace tile (draw mode) | Switch levers (play mode)Right clickErase tile (draw mode)M Hide UIF/F11FullscreenSpaceGamemode switch (draw and play)Arrow Keys / W and SSwitching between layers.CClear layer you are on (draw mode)

You can save whatever you have created in the settings.
